CustomField.formula: IF( OR( VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 1, VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 2 ), 1, IF( OR( VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 3, VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 4 ), 2, IF( OR( VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 5, VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 6 ), 3, IF( OR( VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 7, VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 8 ), 4, IF( OR( VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 9, VALUE(RIGHT(Contact__r.Active_Semester__r.Name, 1)) = 10 ), 5, 0 ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Year Of Study
